# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(terra)
library(tidyterra)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
```


# Load Data

```{r}
km = rast('./kmeans/kmeans_10.tiff')
levels(km) = tibble(id = seq(1, 20),
                    kmeans = seq(1, 20))

pca = rast('./pca/pca.tiff') |>
  subset(c('PC1', 'PC2', 'PC3'))

arts_pc = st_read('./pca/arts_pc.geojson') |>
  select(-matches('PC[456789]{1}[:digit:]?'))
```
